premiumModal.title: Upgrade to use the {name}
premiumModal.description: Your account doesn’t have access to the premium features. Upgrade to the premium version to begin using {name}. You can upgrade your account by getting a license. Click on the button below to view the pricing.

rowCommentSidebar.onlyPremium: Row comments are available in the premium version.
rowCommentSidebar.noComment: No comments for this row yet. Use the form below to add a comment.
rowCommentSidebar.name: Comments

rowComment.errorUserNotCommentAuthor: Only the author of the comment can update or delete it.
rowComment.errorInvalidCommentMention: The mentioned user does not exist.

rowCommentNotification.title: {sender} posted a comment in row {row} in {table}

registerLicenseModal.licenseDescription: A license can only be obtained on baserow.io. If you have already purchased a license, it will be delivered to you by email and you can get in from the overview in your account. Copy and paste the license key in the box below and click on the button to register the license key to this instance. It’s not possible to use the same key on two different installations. {pricingLink} if you don’t have a key yet.

licenseError.unsupported: The provided license is incompatible with your Baserow version. Please update to the latest version and try again.
licenseError.duplicate: The provided license is already registered to this instance.
licenseError.instanceMismatch: The provided license does not belong to this instance.

disconnectLicenseModal.disconnectDescription: Are you sure that you want to disconnect this license? If you disconnect this license while it's active, the related users won’t have access to the plan anymore. It will effectively remove the license. Please contact our support team at {contact} if you want to use this license in another self hosted instance.

kanbanViewStackContext.deleteDescription: Are you sure that you want to delete stack {name}? Deleting the stack results in deleting the select option of the single select field, which might result into data loss because row values are going to be set to empty.

kanbanViewStakedBy.title: Group field
kanbanViewStakedBy.chooseField: Which single select field should the cards be stacked by?

calendarViewType.sharedViewText: Allow anyone to see the data in this view or sync events to your external calendar.
calendarViewType.sharedViewDescription: Paste this link into your calendar application

timelineDateSettingsForm.noCompatibleDateFields: Date fields are missing in the table. Please create a start and end date field in the table first.
timelineDateSettingsForm.incompatibleFieldsErrorMessage: Fields are not compatible. Please choose two valid date fields in the table that use the same settings for 'include time' and use the same timezone for all collaborators.

timelineTimescaleContext.disabledTooltip: This option is available only for date fields with `include time` enabled.

licenses.noLicensesDescription: Your Baserow instance doesn’t have any licenses registered. A premium license gives you immediate access to all of the additional features. If you already have a license, you can register it here. Alternatively you can get one by clicking on the button below.

license.title: {name} plan
license.description: Choose the users that can use the {product_code} plan. This license allows you to grant {product_code} to a maximum of {seats} users.
license.seatLeft: You have no seats left|You have one seat left|You have {count} seats left
license.fillSeats: Fill seats with users that are not on the plan
license.validThroughDescription: After your license has expired, you and any assigned users will no longer be able to use the extra functionality granted by the license.
license.lastCheckDescription: The license is periodically checked for changes. If you for example renewed or upgraded your license, the changes become active after the check.
license.disconnectDescription: If you disconnect this license while it's active, the related users won’t have access to the plan anymore. It will effectively remove the license. Please contact our support team at {contact} if you want to use this license in another self hosted instance.
license.automaticSeatsProgressBarStatus: {seats_taken} / {seats} paid seats and {free_users_count} free seats in use

viewDecoratorType.leftBorderColorDescription: Color the left border of a row
viewDecoratorType.backgroundColorDescription: Color the background of a row
viewDecoratorType.onlyOneDecoratorPerView: You can only have one decoration of that type for a view

decoratorValueProviderType.singleSelectColorDescription: Color rows the same as a single select value
decoratorValueProviderType.conditionalColorDescription: Color rows when they match the conditions

singleSelectColorValueProviderForm.chooseAColor: Which single select field should the row be colored by?

conditionalColorValueProviderForm.colorAlwaysApply: You can add conditions by clicking on the "Add condition" button.
conditionalColorValueProviderForm.title: Colors

redirectToBaserowModal.title: Redirecting to https://baserow.io
redirectToBaserowModal.content: You are leaving your self hosted instance and you are being redirected to https://baserow.io.

premiumTopSidebar.impersonateDescription: This account is impersonated. A page refresh will stop it.
premiumTopSidebar.premiumDescription: Your account has access to the premium features globally

formViewModeType.surveyDescription: One field is visible at the same time.

formViewModePreviewSurvey.deactivated: Survey form is available in the premium version.

baserowLogo.label: Hide Baserow logo on shared view

dateFieldSelectForm.dateField: Which field would you like to use for this view?
dateFieldSelectForm.noCompatibleDateFields: There are no date fields in this table, please create one first.

RowEditModalCommentNotificationMode.modeMentionsDesc: You will only receive notifications when you are mentioned.
RowEditModalCommentNotificationMode.modeAllDesc: You will receive notifications for all comments in this row.

premiumFieldType.aiDescription: A read-only field that holds AI generated text based on the field prompt.

fieldAISubForm.premiumFeature: The AI field is a premium feature
fieldAISubForm.fileFieldHelp: The first compatible file in the field will be used as the knowledge base for the prompt. The file has to be a text file with the supported file extension like .txt, .md, .pdf, .docx.
fieldAISubForm.outputTypeTooltip: Select your desired output format to guide the LLM in generating responses that match your desired options.

rowEditFieldAI.createRowBefore: The AI value can be generated after the row has been created.

aiFormulaModal.title: Generate formula using AI
aiFormulaModal.description: Note that the generated formulas might not always work as expected. We're constructing a prompt for the model, and we load the output in the formula input. It works best with a high parameter model like gpt-4-turbo-preview.
aiFormulaModal.label: Prompt
aiFormulaModal.labelDescription: Describe the formula you would like to generate
aiFormulaModal.noModels: Your Baserow instance and workspace doesn't have any AI models configured. Click on the three dots next to your workspace, then on settings to configure them.

aiOutputType.textDescription: Generates free text based on the prompt.
aiOutputType.choiceDescription: Chooses only one of the field options.
